category: news
title: "Artificial intelligence means drones can dodge through forests at 25mph"
excerpt: "Because it’s fiction, these drones can nimbly thread their way past obstacles like trees and buildings. It’s never quite been like that in real life. Until now. Researchers at the University of Zurich have developed a new kind of artificial intelligence that enables quadcopters to hit high speeds while flying through unpredictable natural environments."
